Class GridNearAtomicFullUpdateRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.GridCacheMessage

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, GridCacheDeployable, Message

    public class GridNearAtomicFullUpdateRequest
extends GridNearAtomicAbstractUpdateRequest
    Lite DHT cache update request sent from near node to primary node.
